input.sentences: for my boyfriend 's 25th birthday | i got a lot of friends together .
i made him a very funky cake | with blue frosting and lots of dots .
he loved the cake . he 's a cake guy . a birthday is n't a birthday without cake for him .
i used my finger to decorate him with frosting .
i love it that he knows how to have fun !
output.sentences: She liked to go out a lot with her friends and boyfriend.
They had a cake  with lots of candles, funky decorations, and some frosting.
She loved being with her friends and the guy that made the cake did a great job.
He was surprised when she scooped up some frosting on her finger to decorate his face.
At the end of the night she felt a lot of love from her friends and the fun that she had.
